docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: As a longtime researcher on the effects of marijuana and its principal active ingredient, delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol, or THC, on the lungs, I reply to a Feb. 16 article on marijuana as medicine and "Making the Pain Go Away" (editorial, March 4).
docs.snippet: To the Editor:   As a longtime researcher on the effects of marijuana and its principal active ingredient, delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol, or THC, on the lungs, I reply to a Feb. 16 article on marijuana as medicine and "Making the Pain Go Away"...
